prepareInstallation.description: The information required for the installation of build 1.

inputs.name: pluginMetadata
inputs.description: The metadata that contains the information about the staged proposal processor.

components.name: addr
components.description: The address responsible for reporting results. For automatic bodies, it is also where the SPP creates proposals.

components.name: isManual
components.description: Whether SPP should create a proposal on a body. If true, it will not create.

components.name: tryAdvance
components.description: Whether to try to automatically advance the stage when a body reports results.

components.name: resultType
components.description: The type(`Approval` or `Veto`) this body is registered with.

components.name: maxAdvance
components.description: The maximum duration after which stage can not be advanced.

components.name: minAdvance
components.description: The minimum duration until when stage can not be advanced.

components.name: voteDuration
components.description: The time to give vetoing bodies to make decisions in optimistic stage. Note that this also is used as an endDate time for bodies

components.name: approvalThreshold
components.description: The number of bodies that are required to pass to advance the proposal.

components.name: vetoThreshold
components.description: If this number of bodies veto, the proposal can never advance even if `approvalThreshold` is satisfied.

components.name: id
components.description: The ID representing the identifier of the rule.

components.name: op
components.description: The operation to apply, as defined in the `Op` enum.

components.name: value
components.description: The value associated with this rule, which could be an address, timestamp, etc.

components.name: permissionId
components.description: The specific permission ID to use for evaluating this rule. If set to `0x`, the passed permission ID will be used.

inputs.name: rules
inputs.description: Allows conditional permissions of who can create proposals using specific rules.

components.name: target
components.description: The target contract to which actions will be forwarded to for execution.

components.name: operation
components.description: The operation type(either `call` or `delegatecall`) that will be used for execution forwarding.

prepareUninstallation.description: The information required for the uninstallation of build 1.
